definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)

sentences.english: No buts. You tin melodrama extinction afterward.
sentences.chinese: 别说可是，还轮不到你绝种呢。

sentences.english: Many were asked, but few were able to answer.
sentences.chinese: 许多人被问到，可是很少人答得出来。

sentences.english: This time on the need to install streetlights, but also how streetlight control?
sentences.chinese: 这个时候就需要安装路灯，可是路灯又要怎么控制？

sentences.english: But it still did not put an end to his shivering.
sentences.chinese: 可是他冷颤还是打个不停。

sentences.english: A couple of years ago, though, curiosity overcame caution.
sentences.chinese: 可是，数年以前，我的好奇心战胜了谨慎。

sentences.english: But the Separatists discovered that the Speedwell leaked and therefore could not make the journey.
sentences.chinese: 可是分离派发现斯碧薇尔号漏水了，所以无法航行。

sentences.english: But Anna combine not ashamed embarrassed, return just expose that kind of the color of the grudge.
sentences.chinese: 可是安娜并不羞窘，还只是露着那种怨恨之色。

sentences.english: More folks are killed by dwi than guns.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，比起枪击更多的人可是死于醉驾的。

sentences.english: But Chen Qingyang came down the hill looking for me again.
sentences.chinese: 可是陈清扬又从山上跑下来找我。

sentences.english: We can't behave like people in novels, though, can we?
sentences.chinese: 可是，我们也不能像小说中的人那样啊，对吗？

sentences.english: However, this does not prevent us from the start of their feelings of confidence.
sentences.chinese: 可是，这并不妨碍我们对彼此感情地久天长的信心。

sentences.english: But we can control our reaction to them.
sentences.chinese: 可是我们能够控制自己的反应。

sentences.english: But I will no longer importune my young cousin.
sentences.chinese: 可是我也不愿意委曲我那年轻的表妹。

sentences.english: But do you imagine that I shall leave Catherine to his duty and humanity?
sentences.chinese: 可是你以为我就会把凯瑟琳交给他的责任和仁爱吗？

sentences.english: Well, Bayer doesn't test for that.
sentences.chinese: 可是，拜尔公司没有对此进行测试。

sentences.english: But be in these not in igneous group.
sentences.chinese: 可是在这些不火的小组里。

definition: but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
